name: Secret of Malarith
description:
Secret of Malarith is a 2D Top-Down RPG, it has an open world with 2 villages (only 1 accessible in the build), quests, items, 2 bosses and a variety of enemies to battle your way through.

Created in 3 months as a college project by Anthony Sturdy, Tom Rafferty and Mitchell Best.

For college we had to keep a sort of dev-log of our progress. So if you're interested in what inspired the games and what progress we made each week, you can read them here: Anthony's DevLog, Tom's Devlog, Mitchell's DevLog

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Roll

E - Inventory

F - Interact

Left Click - Melee Attack

Right Click - Ranged Attack

Please note, this is not a finished game. We only had 3 months to make the game so didn't have time to create a lot of content. There's about an hour or two of content but please keep in mind this is more of a demo rather than a full product, thanks.
